correspAction.placeName: Royal Observatory, Cape of Good Hope

abstract.p: Nearly a year has passed since they received letters from the Herschels. Hopes JH's health is improving. Gives news of her own children, and the work of her husband at Orange River. The Equatorial has arrived safely.
